Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback is {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

message_win.TRY:
THANKS FOR PLAYING!
YOU COULD HAVE WON

Game.page1_line1: [7]Reveal a  single 7 symbol to win the corresponding prize.
Game.page1_line2: [77]Reveal a double 7 symbol to double the corresponding prize.
Game.page1_line3: [777]Reveal a triple 7 symbol to triple the corresponding prize.
Game.page1_line4: [RUBY]Reveal 3 or more Bonus Ruby symbols to start the bonus game.
Game.page2_line1: [WHEEL]Spin the wheel to begin the bonus game.
Game.page2_line2: [WHEELPRIZE]Win a prize when the pointer lands on a prize value.
Game.page2_line3: [WHEELARROW]Advance to the next wheel when the pointer lands on an Arrow symbol.
Game.page2_line4:
[WHEELX]Land on a red X and a Bonus Ruby is removed. 
The bonus ends when no Bonus Rubies remain.
